audioText: Vous ressemblez étonnamment à votre arrière-grand-père selon les anciennes photographies de famille que nous avons découvertes récemment.
question: According to what do you remarkably resemble your great-grandfather?
options: Old family photographs that were recently discovered
Written descriptions found in historical documents
Stories told by elderly relatives during gatherings
Paintings commissioned for special family occasions
explanation: The text states 'Vous ressemblez étonnamment à votre arrière-grand-père selon les anciennes photographies de famille que nous avons découvertes récemment.' - You remarkably resemble your great-grandfather according to the old family photographs that we recently discovered. 'Ressemblez' is the second person plural present form of 'ressembler' (to resemble).
